name: spoke
description: Mass peer to peer texting tool

SUPPRESS_SELF_INVITE.description: Should anonymous visitors be able to create new organizations from the home page? You will probably want to start the app with this off, and then after creating your own organization, come back here and set it to 1

AUTH0_LOGIN_CALLBACK.description: auth0 login callback url --> this should be filled with your app name and match your auth0 configuration

AUTH0_DOMAIN.description: auth0 domain attached to auth0 account

AUTH0_CLIENT_ID.description: auth0 client id attached to auth0 account

AUTH0_CLIENT_SECRET.description: auth0 client secret attached to auth0 account

BASE_URL.description: based on your herokuapp name or domain name

TWILIO_API_KEY.description: for twilio integration and connected to twilio account

TWILIO_APPLICATION_SID.description: for twilio integration and connected to twilio account

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: for twilio integration and connected to twilio account

TWILIO_MESSAGE_SERVICE_SID.description: for twilio integration and connected to twilio account

TWILIO_STATUS_CALLBACK_URL.description: for twilio integration and connected to twilio account

EMAIL_FROM.description: for email notification integration, the from email address

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: in order to export data to an s3 bucket

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: in order to export data to an s3 bucket

AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: in order to export data to an s3 bucket

ADVANCED_OPTIONS.description: Everything below here you should probably leave alone

NODE_ENV.description: node environment determines the application build/start process

JOBS_SAME_PROCESS.description: recommended setting which means that the same node process that runs the web app processes applications.

ASSETS_DIR.description: for assets directory in production build placement

SUPPRESS_MIGRATIONS.description: When updating code, do you want to disable auto-database migrations?

DST_REFERENCE_TIMEZONE.description: Timezone to use to determine whether DST is in effect for a date
